newsitem.title: USA: Xomed Surgical Q3 oper shr profit vs loss.
newsitem.headline: Xomed Surgical Q3 oper shr profit vs loss.

text.p: (All data above 000s except per share numbers)

NOTE - Results for the nine months ended September 28, 1996, include a $2.4 million non-cash after-tax expense from the acquisition of TreBay Medical Corp in April, and a charge of $1.9 million, net of tax, related to restructuring actions.
Results for the nine months ended September 30, 1995, included a charge of $551,000, net of tax, related to the amortization of acquisition costs from the purchase of Xomed-Treace in April 1994.
Excluding these items, operating income for the 1996 period would have been $1.9 million compared to $900,000 in the 1995 period.
Proforma earnings for those periods would have been $0.38 per share against $0.14 per share, respectively.
Full company name is Xomed Surgical Products Inc
